title: Roanoke Announced as an IMBA Silver Ride Center
subtitle: The East Coast Mountain Biking Capital of the World. Executive Director of IMBA, David Wiens makes the announcement at the annual Visit Virginia's Blue Ridge meeting.
description: The East Coast Mountain Biking Capital of the World. Executive Director of IMBA, David Wiens makes the announcement at the annual Visit Virginia's Blue Ridge meeting.
promo: The incredible keynote speaker and best selling author Andrew Davis gives a gripping speech that touches on what makes a town unique, and how that can bring tourism. From Muscle Shoals Alabama, to Warsaw Indiana he gives astute examples of towns that have found their niche. Why are you here? The meeting culminates with multi Leadville 100 champion and IMBA Executive Director David Wiens announcing Roanoke as an IMBA Silver Ride Center, the only one on the East Coast. Andrew Davis toasts to Roanoke, The East Coast Mountain Biking Capital of the World.
author: cole
keywords: virginia, virginias blue ridge, mountain biking, imba, silver ride center, biking, cycling, mtb, trails, tourism, visit, va blue ridge, blue ridge mountains, blue ridge parkway, carvins cove, mill mountain, enduro
